Vouch Mobile in Arizona: Unlimited Plans on AT&T's Network

Get unlimited talk, text & data in the Grand Canyon State for just $30/month. No credit check required.

Arizona at a Glance

Data from Arizona Census Data

Arizona's population has grown 12% in the last decade, with thousands of new residents arriving monthly from California and other high-cost states. Vouch Mobile helps newcomers and longtime Arizonans alike stretch their dollars further in the desert heat.

AT&T Network Coverage in Arizona

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Arizona residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Grand Canyon State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Arizona, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Major Arizona Cities We Cover

Vouch Mobile provides excellent coverage in all major Arizona metropolitan areas:

Phoenix

Full 5G coverage throughout the Valley of the Sun, from downtown to the suburbs

Tucson

Comprehensive coverage in Southern Arizona, including the University of Arizona campus

Mesa

Strong coverage across the East Valley, from downtown Mesa to Gilbert

Scottsdale

Excellent coverage from Old Town to North Scottsdale's resorts

Tempe

Full coverage around ASU and the Mill Avenue District

Chandler

Reliable service in the Southeast Valley tech corridor

Why Arizona Residents Choose Vouch Mobile

  • Arizona's average phone bill of $114/month ranks among the highest in the Southwest—Vouch cuts that by 74%.
  • Whether you're commuting on the I-10, hiking Camelback Mountain, or working at one of Phoenix's tech campuses, you need reliable coverage.
  • No credit check means snowbirds, ASU students, and new Arizona transplants can sign up instantly.
  • AT&T's network covers Arizona from Flagstaff to Yuma, including coverage in popular destinations like Sedona and the Grand Canyon.

The Arizona Commerce Authority shows that Arizona has a high economic data, making affordable phone service even more valuable.

How to Get Started in Arizona

  1. Check Your Phone: Make sure your phone is unlocked and compatible. Learn how to check.
  2. Choose Your Plan: Select our $30/month unlimited plan.
  3. Order Your SIM: Free shipping to any Arizona address.
  4. Activate Online: Simple activation takes just minutes. See our switching guide.
  5. Start Saving: Enjoy unlimited service across Arizona.

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Arizona. AT&T has invested heavily in Arizona infrastructure, providing extensive 5G coverage in Phoenix, Tucson, and other metros, plus reliable LTE across rural areas.

Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Arizona. The average Arizonan pays $114/month for phone service, so you could save over $1,008 per year by switching to Vouch.

No credit check required. Whether you're an ASU student, a new Arizona resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly. We believe everyone deserves affordable wireless.
